summary.span: 包含執行階段追蹤基礎結構在符合 時傳送至追蹤服務的資料。

span.span: Contains the data sent to the tracking service by the runtime tracking infrastructure when it matches a .

summary.span: 這也使用於 屬性的傳回清單中。

span.span: It is also used in the return list of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 當執行階段追蹤基礎結構符合 中的 時，它會透過與追蹤服務關聯的 將 傳送至該追蹤服務。When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a in a , it sends a to the tracking service over the associated with that tracking service. 追蹤服務可以在追蹤記錄中的資料上執行所需的任何動作。The tracking service can perform whatever action is necessary on the data in the tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `eventDateTime` 以國際標準時間 (UTC) 表示。`eventDateTime` is expressed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). `eventOrder` 在工作流程執行個體中保證是唯一的，但不保證循序。`eventOrder` is guaranteed to be unique within the workflow instance; however, it is not guaranteed to be sequential. 執行階段追蹤基礎結構會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，其中包含與特定類型工作流程狀態事件關聯的其他資料。

span.span: Gets or sets an that contains additional data associated with certain types of workflow status events.

span.span: Either a , a , a , or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於大多數的工作流程狀態事件， 是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，但對特定種類的工作流程狀態事件而言，執行階段追蹤基礎結構會使用 傳回有關工作流程狀態事件的其他資料。For most workflow status events, is a null reference (`Nothing`); however, for certain kinds of workflow status events the runtime tracking infrastructure uses to return additional data about the workflow status event. 下表列出對應這些特殊工作流程狀態事件的 值，以及在這些工作流程狀態事件的 中傳回的物件類型。The following table lists the values that correspond to these special workflow status events and the type of object returned in for each of these workflow status events. | 值 Value| 物件 Object| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ||| ||| ||| 這個屬性是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構所設定。This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.

summary.span: 取得或設定與追蹤記錄關聯之工作流程狀態事件的類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of workflow status event associated with the tracking record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TrackingWorkflowEvent` 會包含其中一個 值，該值表示由執行階段追蹤基礎結構比對，並導致傳送 的工作流程狀態事件的種類。`TrackingWorkflowEvent` contains one of the values indicating the kind of workflow status event that was matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure and caused the to be sent. 它反映出工作流程執行個體的目前狀態。It reflects the current status of the workflow instance. 工作流程執行個體僅在工作流程執行個體的狀態變更時發出工作流程狀態事件。因此，只有在發生工作流程狀態變更時，才會比對 。A workflow instance emits workflow status events only when the status of the workflow instance changes, and, therefore, a can be matched only when a workflow status change occurs. 這個屬性是由執行階段追蹤基礎結構所設定。This property is set by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
